I would normally give 9.5 out of 10, and I already have, but I¬¥m lowering my rating.
My level editor stopped working and clicking ,,Create new chamber" crashed the game. I wrote a message to Valve through Steam Support like three times, and they told me that ,,Blah blah blah, we won¬¥t fix anything you idiot...". You are right, I won¬¥t fix my rating too.

[strike] 9.5[/strike] 0/10

EDITTTTTTTTTTT

After multiple months, I found a guy so clever that he fixed the editor, and apparently, it was seriously easy. When Valve knew about this, not telling me about it... who knows, maybe they were dumb and leave customers with a thing that feels like a demo, or they were too lazy... Anything it was, its still fair to change the points
